job.title: Site Reliability Engineer
job.description: Thorough command of both the Windows and Linux Operating Systems, with strong background in troubleshooting eitherKnowledge of native Kubernetes or related enterprise container platforms such as Open ShiftGood understanding of the mechanics of this platform and the deployment pipeline that feeds itKnowledge of Public Cloud Governance frameworks, architectures, configurations, services, and solutions, specifically within Microsoft Azure, but may also include AWS and GCPKnowledge in core Azure services like Azure Kubernetes Service, CosmoDB, Azure Functions, Azure Storage Entities and Concepts, Azure CLI and Powershell CmdletsKnowledge in Azure organizational entities such as Departments, Accounts, Subscriptions, Resource Groups and Management GroupsSkillsFast learner; proactive thinkerAbility to innovate, automate, and continually improve processesExcellent verbal and written communication skillsPossess critical thinking and analytical skillsCapacity to take initiative; desire to become a self-starter
